data.name: N31
data.detailed_description:
The open-world map in N31 gives you the freedom to explore and hit new rivals every day. Jumps and shortcuts, buy new cars, beat all the rival to reach the first position in the Wanted list. Fight against cops and rivals using your pure driving skill.

Features

  • Experience a new way to drive low poly cars! In N31 you will be driving Arcade Style low poly cars, exploring city with them and face up rivals everyday!
  • Test your driving skills with Hyper mode, a series of test in different circuit, the best score and time will be published in the online leaderboard!
  • Split screen multiplayer! Yeah, back we're in 2000! you can now beat your friends in 1 screen with the split screen multiplayer mode!

data.short_description: The open-world map in N31 gives you the freedom to explore and hit new rivals every day. Jumps and shortcuts, buy new cars, beat all the rivals to reach the first position in the Wanted list. Fight against cops and rivals using your pure driving skill.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 - 5th Generation
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 - 5th Generation
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
